== Implementation Discussion

Dimensions are discussed in OGC 06-042, section Annex C, (page 51).
{{{
<Dimension 
  name="dimension_name" 
  units=unit_name 
  unitSymbol="symbol"
  default="default_value" 
  multipleValues="0|1" nearestValue="0|1"
  current="0|1">extent</Dimension>
}}}
